title: Offline JS Bundle for React Native

presets.name: Bundle to a specific output path

entryFile.description: The entry file relative to project root.

transformer.description: Specify a custom transformer to be used.

minify.description: Allows overriding whether bundle is minified.

bundleOutput.description: The output path of the generated files.

maxWorkers.description: The number of workers we should parallelize the transformer on.

sourcemapOutput.description: File name where to store the sourcemap file for resulting bundle, ex. /tmp/groups.map.

sourcemapSourcesRoot.description: Path to make sourcemaps sources entries relative to, ex. /root/dir.

sourcemapUseAbsolutePath.description: Report SourceMapURL using its full path.

assetsDest.description: Directory name where to store assets referenced in the bundle.

readGlobalCache.description: Try to fetch transformed JS code from the global cache, if configured.
